trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism for routing the workflow instance ID to and from a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowWebService" /> to a cookie in the Web client.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um mecanismo para rotear a ID da instância de fluxo de trabalho para/de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowWebService" /> para um cookie no cliente Web.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This functionality is required to reenter a workflow definition that is exposed as a Web service.
trans-unit.target: Essa funcionalidade é necessário para inserir novamente uma definição de fluxo de trabalho que é exposta como um serviço Web.

trans-unit.source: Without this module, the first call to the workflow-exposed Web service works, but subsequent calls fail.
trans-unit.target: Sem esse módulo, a primeira chamada para o serviço Web expostos pelo fluxo de trabalho funciona, mas falha nas chamadas subsequentes.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, make sure that the client application has cookies enabled.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, certifique-se de que o aplicativo cliente tem cookies habilitados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule" />.

Call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System%23Web%23IHttpModule%23Dispose?displayProperty=nameWithType> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System%23Web%23IHttpModule%23Dispose?displayProperty=nameWithType> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System%23Web%23IHttpModule%23Dispose> method leaves the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System%23Web%23IHttpModule%23Dispose> método deixa o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System%23Web%23IHttpModule%23Dispose>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> object so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> object occupied.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System%23Web%23IHttpModule%23Dispose>, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> do objeto para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> objeto ocupado.

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar `Dispose` antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não são liberados até o coletor de lixo chama o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> that provides access to the methods, properties, and events common to all application objects within an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> que fornece acesso a métodos, propriedades e eventos comuns a todos os objetos de aplicativo em um aplicativo ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the workflow Web hosting module and prepares the module to handle requests.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o módulo de hospedagem na Web do fluxo de trabalho e prepara o módulo para tratar solicitações.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System%23Web%23IHttpModule%23Init(System.Web.HttpApplication)?displayProperty=nameWithType> to register event handling methods with specific events.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System%23Web%23IHttpModule%23Init(System.Web.HttpApplication)?displayProperty=nameWithType> para registrar os métodos com eventos específicos de manipulação de eventos.
